caption.p: Principal component analysis. ( a) PCA based on 11 KIR genes. Contributions of the first and second components were 60.10% and 17.49%, respectively. ( b) PCA based on HLA-A, -B, and -C allele frequencies. Contributions of first and second components were 31.47% and 27.02%, respectively. ( c) PCA based on KIRâ€“HLA pairs. Contributions of first and second components were 55.72% and 30.09%, respectively.
